text1:
This is a website that gathers English documentary videos.
I created it because I wanted to try making a video site.
It includes features such as subtitles changing synchronously with video playback and the ability to add short notes to the subtitle section.
I was able to fully explore DOM and Recoil during development.
techUsed: techUsed: Next.js, microCMS, react-player, tiptap-editor, recoil, tailwind, shadcn, typescript, etc
